This paper establishes a link between endowments, patience types, and the
parameters of the HARA Bernoulli utility function that ensure equilibrium uniqueness in
an economy with two goods and two impatience types with additive separable preferences.
We provide sufficient conditions that guarantee uniqueness of equilibrium for any possible
